Text:

16.9% on bottom

and 99.9% on the bottom
spyder52  no need to dl again,i downloaded it 3 times and its the same error

download this isdone.dll file for windows....try this last trick....
http://dll-files.org/7177/ISDone.dll.html
Should that go in the System 32 folder?
Still doesnt work, any smart peeps out there can fix this install problem ( ISdone.dll ) ?

@ Everyone having isdone.dll error
Guys replacing the setup file wouldn't work
Just download freearc from
http://www.freearc.org/Download.aspx
and open the three .bin (Setup-1.bin 2 and 3) with freearc files and extract them in one folder witcher 2
and there you go
